definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: King Sejong the initiative of the Han nationality's culture has been a qualitative leap.
sentences.chinese: 世宗大王的这一创举使韩民族的文化得到了质的飞跃。

sentences.english: This was a policy decision, and I congratulate the Shanghai authorities on setting a precedent.
sentences.chinese: 这是一项政策决定，我祝贺上海当局的这一创举。

sentences.english: Legendary novelette is an innovative and exceptional genre in the history of Chinese fiction.
sentences.chinese: 中篇传奇小说是中国小说发展史上的创举和破例。

sentences.english: The creation of the UN is an epoch-making event in human history.
sentences.chinese: 这是人类历史上具有划时代意义的创举。

sentences.english: It was pioneering because of the far-reaching territory the U.
sentences.chinese: 这项协定是范围广及美国全国领土的创举。

sentences.english: And Yunnan Yikeyin Dwelling is his pioneering research.
sentences.chinese: 而《云南一颗印》是中国民居研究的创举。

sentences.english: Letting roads give way to trees is an innovation in environmental protection at Huanglong.
sentences.chinese: 路让树这是黄龙环保工作的一项创举。

sentences.english: It was a major success for the studio, after the failure of Sleeping Beauty which lost the studio a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 这是工作室继《睡美人》亏损之后一个重大的创举。

sentences.english: This device of ice passages for rail transport - unique invention of Soviet engineers.
sentences.chinese: 开拓冰上通道来建设铁路是苏联工程师的创举。

sentences.english: It blazed new trails in the modern history of China.
sentences.chinese: 这在中国近现代史上仍为一大创举。

sentences.english: Dassault innovation on the cloud drives a lot of interest.
sentences.chinese: 达索在云计算上的创举也吸引了不少眼球。

sentences.english: It is the world's bridge construction history of an innovation and a miracle.
sentences.chinese: 它是世界建桥史上的一项创举和奇迹。

sentences.english: Decoration is one of the world and the sound of a revolutionary innovation in the field.
sentences.chinese: 是世界装饰和音响领域的一项革命性创举。

definition: priority/sth advocated first/refers to ancient tradition: Worship the river first, then the sea.
to create/original creation/to be the first to do sth
one and only (idiom); rarely seen/unique of its kind
to surpass all others of its kind before and since/to have neither predecessors nor successors
pinyin: qian2 wu2 gu3 ren2 hou4 wu2 lai2 zhe3

definition: unprecedented and never to be duplicated/the first and the last/unmatched/unique
